duplicateWhiteVariables.recommendation: Consolidate to single variable (e.g., 'Colors/White') to reduce confusion

unusedAccentColor.recommendation: Verify if intended for links or future features; document usage or remove if obsolete

customStylesNotInSystem.issue: Card Category Label (12px, 0.12 tracking) and Card Title (16px white) not defined in variable_defs
customStylesNotInSystem.recommendation: Promote to named Text Styles in Figma for consistency

nonBrandFontMissing.issue: Urbanist not found in Dashboard text nodes
nonBrandFontMissing.recommendation: Clarify if Urbanist is used elsewhere, deprecated, or pending implementation

recommendation:
Use Figma REST API GET /v1/files/:file_key to retrieve:
- styles object (text style IDs and full definitions)
- GET /v1/files/:file_key/styles to get all published styles
- textStyles property on text nodes to confirm style assignments
